department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Department of National Defence, Royal Military College of Canada (RMC), has a requirement for the supply, delivery, installation and training on a 3D optical profilometer system with white light interferometry-based method and automated XYZ stage.
description: The contract will be awarded to the company with the lowest price.
full_summary:
**Technical Tender Announcement:** Invitation to Tender for 3D Optical Profilometer System
===========================================================

**Tender Reference:** WS3677897868-Doc3688253241
**Publication Date:** October 17, 2022

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) has released a tender call for the supply, delivery, installation, and training of a 3D optical profilometer system. This system will be used at the Royal Military College of Canada (RMC).

**System Requirements:**
-------------------------

The tender requires a 3D optical profilometer system equipped with a white light interferometry-based method and an automated XYZ stage.

**Procurement Details:**
------------------------

* **Procurement Category:** Government of Canada
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Open Tendering Reason:** 
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Región of Opportunity:** None
* **Región of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region - NCR)

**Contact Information:**
------------------------

Ruby Radouane
(TPSGC/PSPC)
E-mail: [ruby.radouane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ruby.radouane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: None
Fax: None

**Tender Closing Date:** October 31, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. (14:00:00)

This tender is closed.

**Additional Information:**

The tender description and solicitation document are available at the following website: 
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14384311?extsite=MTQzODQzMTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Response Form
--------------

Each respondent must submit a responses to the tender electronically on the above-mentioned platform.
